html: Today, a full-time worker making the $7.25 minimum wage has less buying power than that same worker in the 1960s. Gradually raising the minimum wage to $15 by 2024 would give nearly 40 MILLION workers a raise. That’s why I am proud to cosponsor the #RaiseTheWageAct.
text: Today, a full-time worker making the $7.25 minimum wage has less buying power than that same worker in the 1960s. Gradually raising the minimum wage to $15 by 2024 would give nearly 40 MILLION workers a raise. That’s why I am proud to cosponsor the #RaiseTheWageAct.

html: There is no place in America where someone working full time & making the $7.25 federal minimum wage can make ends meet. Today, House & Senate Democrats are introducing the #RaiseTheWage Act to give roughly 40 million workers a raise.pic.twitter.com/6fgmjy5ORC
text: There is no place in America where someone working full time & making the $7.25 federal minimum wage can make ends meet. Today, House & Senate Democrats are introducing the #RaiseTheWage Act to give roughly 40 million workers a raise.pic.twitter.com/6fgmjy5ORC

html: I’m deeply sadden to learn of the passing of former President George H.W. Bush. His life was defined by an inspiring commitment to public service. I admired his steadfast to the causes he believed in. I am grateful to his family for having shared him with all of us.pic.twitter.com/1uoY5b1BeF
text:
I’m deeply sadden to learn of the passing of former President George H.W. Bush.   His life was defined by an inspiring commitment to public service.  I admired his steadfast to the causes he believed in. 

I am grateful to his family for having shared him with all of us.pic.twitter.com/1uoY5b1BeF

html: On Nov. 5, 1968, #ShirleyChisholm made history as the first African-American woman elected to Congress. She was a champion for women, the poor, immigrants and people of color. It’s been 50 years since that milestone – but we have work left to do. Your #vote is your voice. Use it.pic.twitter.com/iOPhizL6uZ

html: No one should feel threatened because of his/her views. We can disagree, but we must learn to air disagreements respectfully. We need to tone down the rhetoric that has been spoken lately. Thank you to our agencies who acted swiftly to counter these potentially dangerous attacks.

html: Operation Blue Roof is available to all counties approved for #FEMA Individual Assistance, which includes Gadsden & Leon. This program temporarily repairs roofs at no cost to families. For more information, visit http://www.usace.army.mil/blueroof  or call 1-888-ROOF-BLU (888-766-3258).

html: My request for @LeonCounty to receive #FEMA Individual Assistance support has been approved. This will release federal funds to help families recover from #HurricaneMichael. html: I am pleased to report that @USDA approved my request for a temporary waiver to allow #SNAP recipients in counties affected by #HurricaneMichael to buy hot food with their benefits through Oct. 31. This waiver is critically important to ensure that no one goes hungry.pic.twitter.com/3Br5Ajzhxi
text: I am pleased to report that @USDA approved my request for a temporary waiver to allow #SNAP recipients in counties affected by #HurricaneMichael to buy hot food with their benefits through Oct. 31. This waiver is critically important to ensure that no one goes hungry.pic.twitter.com/3Br5Ajzhxi

html: Nothing could be more important than ensuring that all workers receive equal pay for equal work. On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts. #Equalpay is not just a women’s issue. It impacts our families, businesses and economy. #EqualPayDaypic.twitter.com/PsvwO8Ocp5
text: Nothing could be more important than ensuring that all workers receive equal pay for equal work. On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts. #Equalpay is not just a women’s issue. It impacts our families, businesses and economy. #EqualPayDaypic.twitter.com/PsvwO8Ocp5

html: #EqualPayDay recognizes that women must work 3 extra months just to earn the same pay as men! Closing the #GenderWageGap can help women's paychecks, families & the economy. Congress should help make workplaces safe&equal by passing the Paycheck Fairness Act. RT if you agree!pic.twitter.com/omIbWWyO9E

html: A #TrumpShutdown means that popular 7(a) and 504 loans would cease to be issued. In the 7(a) program alone, a shutdown would reduce capital to small firms by $110 million per day.
text: A #TrumpShutdown means that popular 7(a) and 504 loans would cease to be issued. In the 7(a) program alone, a shutdown would reduce capital to small firms by $110 million per day.

html: A #TrumpShutdown prevents federal agencies from entering into any new contracts, including those with small businesses. On a daily basis, a shutdown could cause small firms to forgo approximately 6,875 contract actions worth $301,656,083.
